answers.answer: Hi Strong, Yes it could be side effects from your drugs, but these slits, try this its just a simple thing to help you, get some sea salt and do a twice daily warm water wash, the salt well help clean and heal, its known for this but make sure its sea salt.Try googling the side effects of your drugs and see what come up.Good Luck

question: I'm a 53 year old male with type 2 diabetes and presently I have been having a problem with what appears to be small strait cuts along the sides of my penile foreskin I was not circumcised they go away for a short time but come back I have been using some destine to try to heal them to no avail is there a remedy I can use to assist in the healing process ? could it be my medications for  type 2 diabetes, high blood pressure playing a role in this problem ? What can I do.?
title: cut along side of my penile forskin
